unnormalised: Borekarancho ani porjechi kallji ghevn gadi cholovpeankuy porjek! Yetat telachea mapanchea sonvsarant buddkunk, hem vixoi zat ghevn durlookxit kel'lem asa punn amchea gadeank ani tanchea porinnamank zannvak asa. Ami soglle zannam "20 kmpl mileage" vo "45 litrache telache tankichi kapasita" punn tachem khorem orth kitem, ani tem kiteak mahatvachem?
normalised: Bore bore, petrol-ache diwan'no ani parisarachi kallji ghevnuk drivers-ano! Aami fuel-ache mapanchea sansarant dubkun vhochuk, ek vishay zacher sadharan'npan laksh diina punn amchea gaddiank ani tanchea parinamaank samajpaak mahatvacho asa. Aamkam vaakdyank "eka literak vees kilometer mileage" vo "panchachalis literanchi fuel tankachi shamta" sarkhi aikunk yeta, punn tachem khareponnim arth kitem, ani tem kiteak mahatvachem asa?

unnormalised: Poilem, **liters (L)**. Hem tel mapchem sadaronn mapachem ek unit asa. Petrol aso, dizel aso vo CNG aso, tumi telachea pumpacher liters-an vollkhotat. Tumchi tank 50 L bhortana tumkam ugddas asa? Ten'na liters karyak xuru zata.
normalised: Poileach, **liter (L)**. Hem fuel mapchek vaparinuk volume-achem ek standard unit asa. Tem petrol aso, diesel aso, vo C-N-G aso, tankanchi volume tumkam petrol pumpacher literanim diista. Tumchea tankink purtem panchash L bhartoch tumkam aathavta? Te liter vaapratat.

unnormalised: Uprant amchea kodden **kilometers per liter (kmpl)** asa, hem telachem karyachem uttam mapak zannun gheunchea khatir ek mahatvachi metrrik asa. Tumchi gadi tumkam 25 kmpl dita zalear, tacho orth asa ti ek liter telacher 25 kilometer cholta. Kmpl kitem unch, telachem karyachem ten'nem uttam. Ek scooter 60 kmpl dikhavunk xokta, zalear ek vhoddli SUV sumar 12 kmpl divonk xokta.
normalised: Magir **kilometer prati liter (kilometer prati liter)** aasa, fuel efficiency samajpachea khatir ek mahatvachi metric. Tumchi gaddi tumkam panchvis kilometer prati liter deta zalear, tem eka liter fuelavar panchvis kilometer cholpak shaktaa. Kitlim kilometer prati liter odhik astilim, titlim fuel efficiency odhik bore asteli. Ek scooter saat kilometer prati liter dichen, zalear ek vhodd S-U-V bara kilometer prati liter dichen.

unnormalised: Mukhar vetaum, ami **miles per gallon (mpg)**-ik mellttam, ek unit jem samanyoponnan US ani sumar dusrea deshamni vaprat. Bharotant itlem nirmoll naslem tori, tem zannvak mellttalem kiteak te uttam. Kmpl-anthan mpg-ik bodolpak saroll nhui, punn eka sumarache bodolpachem karonn 2.35 asa. Mhonnche 20 kmpl sumar 47 mpg asa.
normalised: Fuddaak aami **miles prati gallon (M-P-G)** pasun bhettole, ek unit jem sadharan'npan U-S ani aanikach kaim desanim vapratat. Bharatant tem odhik lokpriya naslelem, tem gin'nan asop upyukt asa. Kilometer prati liter-antlean M-P-G-nt bodal korop sopem na, punn ek motto badal faktor don point teen paach asa. Mhunnche, vees kilometer prati liter sumar chalis saat M-P-G asa.

unnormalised: Kednam tori, telachem sevan **liters per 100 kilometers (L/100km)** mhonnunui sangtat. Hem dakhoita ki ek gadi 100 kilometer cholpak kitle liters tel vaparta. Hem telachem karyachem kmpl poris ulttem map asa. Ek unnea L/100kmachem mol uttam karyachem dakhoita. He ritin vichar korum: 8 L/100km mhonnche gaddiek 100 kilometer cholpak 8 liters tel zai.
normalised: Konnshtakani, fuel consumption **liter prati ek shambar kilometer (L slash ek shambar kilometer)** asun diitalem. Hem ek shambar kilometer cholchea khatir ek gaddi kitele liter fuel upaogak gheta ten dakhta. Hem kilometer prati liter-achea tulnent fuel efficiency-achem ulttem map asa. Ek unnem L slash ek shambar kilometer mulya odhik borem efficiency dakhta. Ashem chintat: aath L slash ek shambar kilometer mhunnche gaddik ek shambar kilometer cholchea khatir aath liter lagtat.

unnormalised: Atam, telache tankiche kapasitecho vichar korum, samanyoponnan liters-an uktem korun sangtat. Ek Maruti Suzuki Alto sumar 35L telache tankichi kapasita dhorunk xokta, zalear ek Toyota Fortuner 80 L voir dhorunk xokta. Tumchi telache tankichi kapasita zannam asloli lamb drive niyojit korpak uttam, khasan dur aslolea vistarani zun telachem pump mellponn nasle.
normalised: Aata, aami fuel tankachi shamta pasun dhyaan divuya, sadharan'npan literanim dichentat. Ek Maruti Suzuki Alto koddchim sumar teen paanch L-chem fuel tankachi shamta asta, zalear ek Toyota Fortuner assi L-anche voddem dharonk shaktaa. Tumchea fuel tankachi shamta zan'nonk vhodd cholnyaan planning korchea khatir upyukt asa, khas korun durchea deshamani zanvchen petrol pump kami asonk shaktaa.

unnormalised: Sadaronn mapanchea bhair, tumkam her utram mellonk xoktat. Udahoronnak, **BTU per gallon (BTU/gallon)** telachea xakticho map asa. Sorv sadaronnoponnan grahkanchea vapracho na zaleari, to her telachea prakaranchi xaktichea drxhtikonnan tulna korpak sombondit asa.
normalised: Standard mapachea bhair, tumkam aanikach utaraanchee bhettonk shaktaa. Zachem udaharnn mhunnche, **B-T-U prati gallon (B-T-U slash gallon)** hem fuel-ache udarji dharnyaachem map asa. Te sadharan'npan vapar-taren vapar-nashillem, punn tem udarjeachea dristikonnatun vegveglli prakarche fuelaanchi tulna korpak sambandhit asa.

unnormalised: Telachi gunnovttaui ek bhumika nibhavta. Octane rating, sodanch **Research Octane Number (RON)**-an mapun, telachem knocking vo pre-ignition-ak virodhachem dakhoita. Unch RON tel (zo 95 RON vo 97 RON) samanyoponnan unch-karyache engineank suchoitat.
normalised: Fuel quality pasun ek bhoomika korta. Octane rating, sadharan'npan **Research Octane Number (R-O-N)**-anim dichentat, fuelachem knocking vo pre-ignition-ak virodh dakhta. Odhik R-O-N fuela (jem nave R-O-N vo navya R-O-N sarkhem) sadharan'npan odhik uttam engineachea khatir suchovtat.

unnormalised: Nimannem, pumpak dakhovloli kimot sodanch tpasum, chodd korun Rs./L mhonnun dita. Hi telachi mapam zannun tumkam tumchea gadeam vixim, cholovpache ritink ani telachea nivddank somzunk xokta, tumchem duddu vachovpak ani tumcho porjecher porinnam komi korpak!
normalised: Shevttache, petrol pumpachea daranim dichench dar vhancha, sadharan'npan rupiya prati L dichentat. Hem fuel mapan samajtak tumkam tumchea gaddiye, cholnyaachee savi ani fuel-anchea pasandachee vishayanim mahiti ghevnuk nirnyo ghencheak shaktai, tumche paise bachavunk ani tumchea parisarachar parinam kami korpak!
